title:
Can you clarify the roles of each of the agencies that operate in marked boats on the Intracoastal Waterway in New Hanover, including those marked:

-The U.S. Coast Guard

-The U.S. Coast Guard Auxiliary

-Wildlife Officer

-Sheriff\'s

-Marine Patrol

-Police
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=14751
